title: #hetisingewikkeld
overview: To the outside world, Lien and Peter have it all. A solid marriage, good jobs and two beautiful children. But their love hasn't been the same for over 2 years and they decide to seperate. Lien throws herself back in the dating pool, while Peter is having an identity crisis. Still living under the same roof, the two find a way to co-habitate without meddling with each other's lives.
